abstract: Vodafone‘s tax position has become a focal point as some of the phone giant’s shareholders push it to spin off its Verizon Wireless stake. The Financial Times’s Lex column said that the chances of a tax-free spinoff “seem slim.”
lead_paragraph: Vodafone‘s tax position has become a focal point as some of the phone giant’s shareholders push it to spin off its Verizon Wireless stake. The Financial Times’s Lex column said that the chances of a tax-free spinoff “seem slim.”

headline.main: For Vodafone, Tax Holds Key to Spinoff
